column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////The place is nice; dimly lit as if to be perfect for a date night. However
column2: if you are there when they are busy
column3: this place is less than romantic. The seating is split into three types: 2-person booths
column5: and large tables that they will sit people next to each other (like a hibachi restaurant). The place is fairly small and can get very loud during rush hours. Luckily I have always been sat at the booth
